Description: Hello all, for your consideration is a great older ESP MII Custom. This pre dates Kirk Hammett signatures models, it was this version that ended up becoming his signature guitar. This one is 27 years old and shows some players wear and a few nicks and dings here and there. Guitar plays absolutely fantastic with nice low action frets are in decent shape however may need a fret dress eventually. 3 way pickup selector Vol/Vol/Tone controls, Maple neck Rosewood fretboard, skull and crossbones inlays and ESP Custom on the headstock. The pickups were upgraded recently with the newer black chrome EMG 81 and 85 and makes it look and sound that much better. Considering the age of the guitar it really has a great worn feel and a natural relic vibe going on to make it look like a seasoned veteran. The guitar has been played and by no means is it a collectors item but it's a fairly rare piece and it's a great guitar to play. Comes with a newer SKB case with TSA latches that's in excellent condition also included is a black levy’s leather strap and it has the original tremolo bar for the Floyd Rose. One of the pictures shows at one point in time someone re-drilled the screw to mount the strap button on the upper horn, it doesn't affect the playability by any means and is only cosmetic, but still wanted it noted. Lastly the stickers that were put on it are meant for it to look more like his signature guitars they can be removed very easily if need be. Please ask any questions that you may have I will get back to everyone in a timely manner. I ship to the continental US only so please don't ask me to ship anywhere else.
Title: ESP MII M2 Custom Pre KH2 1992
